title: Simulation-Based Mathematics Education Design for Traditional Cake Preservation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic math concepts (algebra, ratios, geometric shapes comprehension)
context.additional_context: Project-based learning environment where students explore mathematical principles in traditional cake-making processes through smartphone-based VR simulations, fostering cultural preservation awareness.

learning_goals: Learners can solve ratio calculation problems that arise in traditional cake manufacturing processes.
VR simulations can explain cake design principles using geometric shapes.
Through project-based assessment, learners can mathematically model and present cultural heritage preservation strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
